item.title: Windows 7 Upgrade not available in EU
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

You have to use IE to download updates, which is why the EU fined MS.

item.source: Windows 7 Upgrade not available in EU

item.title: Windows 7 Upgrade not available in EU
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:27, topic:285379”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=377142.msg2846650#msg2846650 date=1246317761]

Hopefully the sales will be bad here in the EU.

Agreed. Power to the Japanese population minus less than 1000 or so that didn’t pay for Vista and probably won’t pay for Windows 7, and even more power to the Chinese.
I hope EU furthers the cause, because fat cats like Bill Gates shit me.

Steve Balmer is fatter and is the boss over Microsoft now.
But you should blame EU(European Union), this is because of they have to remove IE I think.
[/quote]
which is so gay, because personally i dont give a fuck if IE is there, anyone that knows about computers will uninstall it and re-install a new browser or keep IE, they will make an informed decision. People that dont know about computers wont care so they will use what they know or what they have which will be IE. I dont see the issue personally, they let apple ship with safari so microsoft cant ship with IE because…[/quote]
Microsoft can ship Windows with IE, but EU/Opera wants MS to add more browsers.
The reason is to make the competition between browsers make fair since MS have a very big marked share.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 Upgrade not available in EU

item.title: Windows 7 Upgrade not available in EU
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:26, topic:285379”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=377142.msg2846535#msg2846535 date=1246312483]

Hopefully the sales will be bad here in the EU.

Agreed. Power to the Japanese population minus less than 1000 or so that didn’t pay for Vista and probably won’t pay for Windows 7, and even more power to the Chinese.
I hope EU furthers the cause, because fat cats like Bill Gates shit me.
[/quote]
Steve Balmer is fatter and is the boss over Microsoft now.
But you should blame EU(European Union), this is because of they have to remove IE I think.[/quote]
I’d imagine that it wouldn’t be such an issue if the user wasn’t forced to keep Internet Explorer installed against their will. Unfortunately that’s the game Microsoft likes to play.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

script_owned:

Linux ftl.

script_owned:

why? because its my opinion and i have tried it before and i have personal reasons on why i dont like it.

Sit the fuck down, you have no idea what you’re talking about.

Niall:

It doesn’t mean it fails though, if you don’t like something about it you can change it, unlike windows where you’re stuck with the same shit for years.

Niall is correct, in almost every environment you can tailor it to your liking.
